name: Woof need to go deeper
description:
Howdy!

Welcome to Woof need to go deeper! This game was made for the Ludum Dare 48 contest. I hope you all enjoy the game.

What's the game about?

Well... Dogs! Everyone likes dogs! This game is only for 2 players. There is no single player content. One of you plays as one dog; and the other one plays as the other dog! There are three modes to choose from:

1. Bone finders: A bone is randomly burried within the sand or dirt. You'll have to dig in order to find it! The first one to find it and bring it to their dog house wins!

2. Hide and Seek: One of you hides a bone within the stage. Then, the other one has to find it before the time runs out!

3. Bone frenzy: The stage will gradually get filled with bones! Whoever can collect the most wins!
